TopicTitle: Could we get a mod compatibility sticky?

Articles.Content: I was just wondering if we could get a mod compatibility sticky, I realize that this update probably broke more mods than normal

Seems we could already add KER to the 1.0 list...Already has its SECOND 1.0 update released...lol

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230
Surely SoonTM was the best reply for that?!
I feel my response was 100% adequate, on reflection. Especially given what is now stickied.
